content.description: Sasha felt confident that she was doing her job well. One day she learned that her position was being eliminated. She determined that losing her job was just bad timing due to a change in her industry, and she felt that she would be able to find another job soon because of her skills.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best applies to her reasoning?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
